title: Spectacles,Epics and Blockbusters: history and analysis of big-budget Hollywood film-making since 1915
abstractText: This project aims to provide a comprehensive account of the tradition of high-cost, large scale Hollywood films from the teens to the 1990s. It will include Biblical and historical epic, westerns, war films, disaster films and contemporary blockbusters in the prestige and action-adventure traditions, all of them linked by their emphasis on spectacle and by their status as special events. The completed project will form my half of a co-authored (with Steve Neale) book entitles SPECTICLES, EPIC AND BLOCKBUSTERS, to be written in a clear and accessible manner, aimed at the widest possible audience, and to be published by Wayne State University Press.
